short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Verify your Connexity Performance Tag implementation on your site.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Once you've installed the tracking tag on your site, the Connexity Tag Helper shows whether the tag can be found on the current page, and whether events are being fired with the appropriate parameters. 

Make a test order on your site using the Connexity Tag Helper and verify the order conversion event values in the extension window.
